PIPETTE: You're a coward!
PETER: I am not! I'm sensible, that's all.
Who wants to go around picking fights
all the time?
PIPETTE: Sergeant Klooque isn't afraid of a
fight.
PETER: No....and what does it get him?
PIPETTE: That.

(TO PIPETTE) Young lady, I salute
you. The greatest hero in the army
salutes you.
(HIDING BEHIND PETER) Oh my goodness,
he's going to salute me! Peter, if
he salutes me, I'll scream.
PETER: Don't worry. He salutes everybody.
KLOOQUE: The young lady appears frightened.
PETER:
The young lady is very shy.
